Description: First day cover of stamps issued by the British Post Office commemorating General Anniversaries in 1972 and featuring the centenary of the birth of the British composer Ralph Vaughan Williams, the discovery of Tutankhamun's tomb in 1922 and the creation of Her Majesty's Coastguard in 1822.
Curator's comments: Fair; postmarked Richmond and Twickenham, 26th April 1972.
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Ralph Vaughan-Williams
Named in inscription & portrayed: Her Majesty's Coastguard
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Antiques On High Ltd
